{{音游曲信息 |image=bemani_mana.jpg |曲名= MANA |BPM=195 |作曲家=[[DJ YOSHITAKA]] |略称= |版权=原创曲 |初出=pop'n music 20
fantasia |音游= {{音游曲信息/popn|曲风=SUPER SPLASH TUNE|担当角色=MANA|简单=--|普通=27|困难=38|EX=44}} {{音游曲信息/reflecbeat|Plus收录=是|街机收录=是|简单=3|普通=6|困难=9}} }} '''MANA'''，是由DJ YOSHITAKA创作的，出自BEMANI音乐游戏《pop'n music 20 fantasia》的一首曲目。 {{#widget:YouTube|id=c9mO_ZTxtPA}} == 简介 == DJ YOSHITAKA的曲目之一，初出pop'n music。 曲目和[[SHION]]相仿，封面风格相近，被视为该曲的续作。 ([[High School Love]]+[[Evans]]+[[LOVE☆BA☆ZOOKA!]]+[[MENDES]])+CaptivAte系列+[[JOMANDA]] == 移植 == pop'n music：20 fantasia初出。 Reflec Beat：colette winter，隐藏曲收录。 == 歌词 == I'm here. You seemed to hear. You're aware of me, turned your head round, and gave me a kind smile. Please stay a little longer. Without being noticed, I concealed my emotions by stealth. before waking... I can never stare at you. Therefore I want to approach you. I can never step into you. It goes without saying anymore. That place where I longed for adds to brightness. I see our distance is far so much. Still I pray I want to touch you, reflect me in your eyes sometimes. With that alone it's my dream... [[分类:BEMANI系列音乐]] [[Category:日本音乐作品]]
